column2: This report assesses occupied periods only. Please be aware that TM52 should be conducted for occupied and/or “available hours”.
Use of educational NCM profiles may be seen as inappropriate due to prolonged unoccupied periods during summer months.
See Section 6.1.2 (a) of TM52 for further information.
A TM 52 2013 analysis provides an assessment of comfort compliance based on bulk air modelling
i.e. each space is considered idealised and the air in the space perfectly mixed. The assessment does
not assess placement of space features e.g. windows & openings, airflow patterns or discomfort issues.
The user should assess these design aspects outside of the TM52 analysis.
